text: aur yadi ham chaahate, to un (aayaton) ke dvaara usaka pad ooncha kar dete, parantu vah maaya-moh mein pad gaya aur apanee manamaanee karane laga. to usakee dasha us kutte ke samaan ho gayee, jise haanko, tab bhee jeebh nikaale haanpata rahe aur chhod do, tab bhee jeebh nikaale haanpata hai. yahee upama hai, un logon kee, jo hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaate hain. to aap ye kathaayen unhen suna den, sambhavatah ve soch-vichaar karen
